abstract: von Ribbentrop denies German-USSR intent to draw Balkans into war; German Govt circles admit interest in conf; Italy to watch conf
snippet: BERLIN, Feb. 1 (AP)--Foreign Minister Joachim von Ribbentrop today disclaimed any intention on the part of Germany and Soviet Russia to draw the Balkans into the Allied-German war....

headline.main: RIBBENTROP HOPES FOR BALKAN PEACE; Reich Foreign Minister Denies German-Soviet Intention to Draw States Into War BRITISH CURB DELIVERIES Export Licenses for Rumania Are Reported Suspended-- Italy Watching Parley

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Feb. 1 (AP)--Foreign Minister Joachim von Ribbentrop today disclaimed any intention on the part of Germany and Soviet Russia to draw the Balkans into the Allied-German war.
